/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings made of brick, their red and brown hues adding a warm tone to the image. Overhead, power lines crisscross against the backdrop of a clear blue sky. On the left side of the street, trees and bushes add a touch of greenery, contrasting with the urban architecture. The image is bathed in natural daylight, highlighting the colors and details of the scene.
